user_query: Could you please fetch the current price of Apple stock from the StockExchangeAPI? Additionally, provide me with the forecasted stock price for the next 6 months for the DAX index using the Global Market Indices Data API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current price of Apple stock from the StockExchangeAPI.
Fetch the forecasted stock price for the next 6 months for the DAX index using the Global Market Indices Data API.
